entries.organic_structure_large: This container holds large amounts of organic structural materials such as bones or wood.
entries.organic_structure_small: This container holds small amounts of organic structural materials such as bones or wood.
entries.organic_hide_large: This container holds large amounts of creature hides and pelts.
entries.organic_hide_small: This container holds small amounts of creature hides and pelts.
entries.organic_food_large: This container holds large amounts of consumable solid foodstuffs.
entries.organic_food_small: This container holds small amounts of consumable solid foodstuffs.
entries.inorganic_water_large: This container holds large amounts of water.
entries.inorganic_water_small: This container holds small amounts of water.
entries.inorganic_minerals_large: This container holds large amounts of non-reactive ore.
entries.inorganic_minerals_small: This container holds small amounts of non-reactive ore.
entries.inorganic_gas_large: This container holds large amounts of non-reactive gas.
entries.inorganic_gas_small: This container holds small amounts of non-reactive gas.
entries.inorganic_chemicals_large: This container holds large amounts of non-reactive liquids.
entries.inorganic_chemicals_small: This container holds small amounts of non-reactive liquids.
entries.energy_solid_large: This container holds large amounts of energetic ore.
entries.energy_solid_small: This container holds small amounts of energetic ore.
entries.energy_radioactive_large: This container holds large amounts of radioactive ore.
entries.energy_radioactive_small: This container holds small amounts of radioactive ore.
entries.energy_liquid_large: This container holds large amounts of energetic liquid.
entries.energy_liquid_small: This container holds small amounts of energetic liquid.
entries.energy_gas_large: This container holds large amounts of energetic gas.
entries.energy_gas_small: This container holds small amounts of energetic gas.
